Graphics - MinGfx

Created:2018-02-11  Last modified:2018-02-11

  • Introduction
  • Usage
  • References

  1. Introduction

    MinGfx is a graphics library based on OpenGL 3.3+ developed and maintained by Prof. Daniel Keefe(dfk@umn.edu). The library is used in UMN CSci-3081W (Spring 2018) class project.

    Installtion

    Install this library on Ubuntu 16.04.

    Requirement: cmake version 3.9 or above

    1. OpenGL

          sudo apt-get install cmake libx11-dev xorg-dev libglu1-mesa-dev freeglut3-dev libglew1.5 libglew1.5-dev libglu1-mesa libglu1-mesa-dev
        libgl1-mesa-glx libgl1-mesa-dev

    2. NanoGUI

          git clone https://github.com/wjakob/nanogui.git --recursive
    cd nanogui
    cmake CMakeLists.txt
    make
    optional [sudo make install]

    3. MinGfx

          git clone https://github.com/ivlab/MinGfx.git
    cd MinGfx
    optional [add "set(AUTOBUILD_NANOGUI ON)" to CMakeLists.txt]
    cmake CMakeLists.txt
    make
    optional [sudo make install]

  2. Usage
